Title: Sitefinity Social Widgets Contrib
Description: Sitefinity Social Widget Contrib makes it easier for GiveCamp Charities and other Sitefinity users to pull their social feeds into your site. You'll no longer have to build one off controls. It's developed in a combination of C# and JQuery.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Sitefinity Social Widget Contrib makes it easier for GiveCamp Charities and other Sitefinity users to pull their social feeds into your site. You'll no longer have to build one off controls. It's developed in a combination of C# and JQuery.

Development Requirements
You will need Sitefinity 4.0 SDK or Sitefinity 4.0 Community Edition to modify or enhance the code in this project. You can download either of these by visiting the Telerik Sitefinity website. You will find the needed assemblies to reference in the Sitefinity download.

Other References
This project makes use of the Facebook SDK, jQuery Image Rotator Plugin, and prettyPhoto.
